name: Gallop Racer 2003: A New Breed
synopsis: If you're tired of racing vehicles, Gallop Racer 2003: A New Breed offers another way to satisfy your need for speed. This game immerses you in the exciting and fast-paced world of horse racing. Select from six jockeys and more than 3,000 new horses, and then race on more than 30 new track environments. A new gambling system lets you bet on each race, allowing you to earn more money to spend on new horses, training facilities, and breeding equipment. Whether you want to be a betting spectator or a horse-breeding champion, Gallop Racer 2003 gives you an intense racing experience.
